message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $120 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $85 right now.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at 105?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  I'm still a bit above my budget at $105.  Would you be willing to do $95?  That's the very most I can offer.
I understand that 95 is a stretch for you, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more room to breathe. How about we meet at 100?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $100 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $90. If we can agree on that, I'd be happy to buy the product from you.
I understand that 90 is still a bit below your target, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more room to breathe. How about we meet at 98?
